body: I was wondering the approximate time when the server is most full

title: Server Height time

replies.body: The server is never full, and I mean never, and the player count differs. Usually, it's much higher on weekends though. :D
replies.body_tagged: The server is never full, and I mean never, and the player count differs. Usually, it's much higher on weekends though. :D

replies.body: On Saturday and Sunday I've seen over 10 games in a row be full to the max
